abilities.name: Special Equipment.
abilities.description: Rezmir has the Black Dragon Mask, Hazirawn, and an insignia of claws.

abilities.name: Amphibious.
abilities.description: Rezmir can breathe air and water.

abilities.name: Dark Advantage.
abilities.description: Once per turn, Rezmir can deal an extra 10 (3d6) damage when she hits with a weapon attack, provided Rezmir has advantage on the attack roll.

abilities.name: Draconic Majesty.
abilities.description: While wearing no armor and wearing the Black Dragon Mask, Rezmir adds her Charisma bonus to her AC (included).

abilities.name: Immolation.
abilities.description: When Rezmir is reduced to 0 hit points, her body disintegrates into a pile of ash.

abilities.name: Legendary Resistance
abilities.description: If Rezmir fails a saving throw while wearing the Black Dragon Mask, she can choose to succeed instead.
